Content: **EDIT** 4/27/23 Another app update. Reinstalled/restarted and still freezing up. Screen changes are slow and not smooth. I'll give it a few days before I uninstall. Hoping for a fix. I really love it when it works well. Worked great until yesterday. Won't open. Reinstalled and still won't open. ***Update*** Restarted and reinstalled...working now. Thank you!
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
